name: changelog: add
description: A new feature, function, or functionality was added.

name: changelog: breaking
description: A change breaking previous API or functionality.

name: changelog: fix
description: Took care of something that wasn't working.

name: changelog: none
description: Skip changelog entry for this PR

name: changelog: tweak
description: Small change, that isn't actually very important.

name: changelog: update
description: Big changes to something that wasn't broken.
